name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in creating high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java** and **Kotlin**, with extensive experience in utilizing **CI/CD** practices and **GitLab** for streamlined deployment processes. Highly skilled in database management using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and caching with **Redis**. Expertise in implementing microservices architecture and container orchestration through **Docker**, **Docker Swarm**, and **Kubernetes**. Experienced in version control, ensuring code integrity and collaborative development.

In addition to core competencies, I have hands-on experience in front-end and back-end development leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proven ability to build AI/ML-powered platforms that enable predictive analytics and real-time processing, with a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
